About

Hi this is Natsuko from Japan! I’m currently living in Kathmandu to work on a startup I co-found TECHRISE , with my boyfriend Take. Excited about all thing related to social impact, social innovation and ice cream. I’ll be blogging about my daily adventures here in Kathmandu starting up our startup. Hope you enjoy it! Comments are super welcome :)
